TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed PropertyContainerEditMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Contains the different edit modes of a <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainerEditMode Dialog = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Edit mode of the property inspector dialog window, which enables the implementation of a pop-up window to contain the property editor.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainerEditMode ExtendedPinned = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Editor mode of the property inspector dialog window, which enables the implementation of an additional user interface pinned into place within the property inspector window.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainerEditMode ExtendedPopup = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Editor mode of the property inspector dialog window, which enables the implementation of an additional user interface displayed on top of the property inspector window.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainerEditMode Inline = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Inline editor mode of the property inspector dialog window, which enables the editing of values directly into that window.
